content: Our subscription revenue of $39 million represents an increase of $53 million compared to the third quarter of 2021, and it's primarily driven by the continued adoption of Inspirato Pass, which ended the period up 60% year-over-year at just over 3,800 subscriptions. Your line is now open. Your line is now open. Another -- sorry, just one other component that's going to be quite important in the coming quarters, we're not prepared to talk about it today in detail, but a preview of coming attractions is interestingly Inspirato for Business and Inspirato for Good, both contain a combination of subscription revenue and  state revenue, because they come with bundled memberships as well as travel. Your line is now open. Yes, it's a good question. Yes, it's a good question. Your line is now open. Your line is now open.
